content.question: After reading the scenario, please respond to A, B, and C below. Describe the constitutional amendment that is most relevant to the Supreme Court cases referenced in the scenario and explain why that amendment is applicable to state laws. Explain how changes in the membership of the Supreme Court might have led to the decisions in the three cases on juvenile sentences referenced in the scenario. Describe the judicial approach to decision making that supports judges establishing policies for states on juvenile sentences, and explain how this approach to decision making is reflected in the scenario.
